quote: Why yes, I can,' said Midas Mulligan, when he was asked whether he could name a person more evil than the man with a heart closed to pity. 'The man who uses another's pity for him as a weapon.
quote_letters: WHY YES I CAN SAID MIDAS MULLIGAN WHEN HE WAS ASKED WHETHER HE COULD NAME A PERSON MORE EVIL THAN THE MAN WITH A HEART CLOSED TO PITY THE MAN WHO USES ANOTHERS PITY FOR HIM AS A WEAPON
